page.title: 20DOMESDAY CONTRIBUTORS GROBY.
page.content: The information in this study was collected by children and staff at Brookvale High School,Groby and Martinshaw Primary School,Groby. The contributors(with their page nos.) are as follows: Mr.J.Gillingham 1,3,5,11,14,15,20. P.Robinson 2.Katrina Hawkins and Sarah Worth 4.Simon Jeffs 6.Donna Smith 7.Alison Craig 8.Ms.K.McGovern 9. Kathryn Thomas 10.Karl Biddle 12.Heidi Smith,Jo Parker and Simon Jeffs 13.Maurice Woodward 16.Katrina Hawkins 17.Neil McCathie 18.Jane Adcock and Angela Freeman 19. Our thanks to all those in Groby and Ratby who helped in any way towards the compilation of this document.
